Chapter 1

[The Van Heusen Hotel]288-the van heusen hotel was the love of [Merina Van Heusen]2471-merina ’s life . [The historical building]288-the van heusen hotel dominated [the corner of [Rush]1-rush and [East Chicago Avenue]2-east chicago avenue]289-the corner of rush and east chicago avenue , regal and beautiful , a living work of art .

[[[Her]2471-merina parents]290-her parents ’ hotel]291-her parents ’ hotel had once been [the Bell Terrace]292-the bell terrace , [home]293-home away from [home]293-home to celebrities such as [Audrey Hepburn]54-audrey hepburn , [Sammy Davis Jr.]55-sammy davis jr. , and more recently , [Lady Gaga]56-lady gaga and [the late Robin Williams]162-bobbie . The original structure perished in [the Great Chicago Fire of 1871]294-the great chicago fire of 1871 , only to be resurrected bigger , better , and more beautiful .

There was a life lesson in there .

[Latte]58-latte in hand , [Merina]2471-merina breathed in the air in [the lobby]295-the lobby , a mix of vanilla and cinnamon . Faint but reminiscent of the famed dessert invented in [the hotel ’s kitchen]296-the hotel : the snickerdoodle . On [her]2471-merina way past [Arnold]2447-arnold , who stood checking [a guest]297-a guest into [the hotel]296-the hotel , [she]2471-merina snagged one of the fresh - baked cookies off a plate and winked at [him]2447-arnold .

[The dark - skinned older man]298-the dark - skinned older man slid [her]2471-merina a smile and winked back . Having practically grown up here , [the VH]299-the vh was [a second home to [her]2471-merina]299-the vh . [Arnold]2447-arnold had started out as [a bellman]300-a bellman and had worked [here]301-here for as long [she]2471-merina could remember . [He]2447-arnold was as good as [family]302-family .

[She]2471-merina dumped [her]2471-merina purse in [[her]2471-merina office]303-her office and finished [her]2471-merina cookie , holding on to the latte while [she]2471-merina meandered down [the hallways]304-the hallways , checking to make sure there were no trays outside the doors that needed collecting . At the end of the corridor on [the first floor]305-the first floor , [she]2471-merina saw a man outside [one of [the rooms]304-the hallways]306-one of the rooms , drill whirring away .

“ Excuse [me]2471-merina , ”[2471-merina] [she]2471-merina called . Then had to call again to be heard over the sound . When [she]2471-merina came into view , [he]2447-arnold paused the drilling and looked up at [her]2471-merina .

[He]2447-arnold wore a tool belt and navy uniform , and the antique doorknob was sitting on the floor at [his]2447-arnold feet along with a small pile of sawdust .

“ What are [you]2083-you doing ? ”[2471-merina] [she]2471-merina asked , bending to pick up the heavy brass . [[Her]2471-merina parents]290-her parents had done away with “ real keys ”[290-her parents] the moment [they]290-her parents took over , installing [the popular keycard entry hotels]308-the popular keycard entry hotels now used , but the antique doorknobs remained .

“ Installing the fingerprint entry . ”[309-the uniformed man] From [his]2447-arnold pocket , [the uniformed man]309-the uniformed man pulled out a small silver pad with a black opening , then went back to drilling .

“ No , no , no . ”[2471-merina] [She]2471-merina placed the doorknob back on the ground and dusted [her]2471-merina hand on [her]2471-merina skirt . “ [We]2084-we ’re not doing any fingerprint entry . ”[2471-merina] [She]2471-merina offered a patient smile . “ [You]2084-we need to double - check [your]2084-we work order . ”[2471-merina]

[He]309-the uniformed man gave [her]2471-merina a confused look . “ [Ma’am]61-ma’am ? ”[309-the uniformed man] [He]309-the uniformed man was looking at [Merina]2471-merina , but [his]309-the uniformed man voice was raised .

[[Merina]2471-merina ’s mother]2471-merina , [Jolie]67-jolie , appeared from behind the hotel room door , [her]67-jolie eyebrows raising into hair that used to be the same honeyed shade of blond as [Merina]2471-merina ’s but now was more blond to hide the gray .

“ Oh , [Merina]2471-merina ! ”[2471-merina] [[Her]67-jolie mother]2471-merina smiled , but [her]67-jolie expression looked a little pained .

“ Can [you]63-gary give [me]67-jolie a minute with [[my]67-jolie daughter]2471-merina , [Gary]63-gary ? ”[67-jolie] Like [she]67-jolie was [[Gary]63-gary ’s mother]2471-merina , [Jolie]67-jolie fished a five - dollar bill from [her]67-jolie pocket and pressed it into [his]309-the uniformed man palm . “ Go to [the restaurant]2085-the restaurant and have [Sharon]64-sharon make [you]64-sharon a caramel macchiato . [You]64-sharon wo n’t be sorry . ”[67-jolie]

[Gary]63-gary frowned but took the cash . [Merina]2471-merina shook [her]2471-merina head as [he]63-gary walked away .

“ [Sweetheart]65-sweetheart . ”[67-jolie] [Jolie]67-jolie offered another smile . A tight - lipped one meaning there was bad news . Like when [Merina]2471-merina ’s cat , [Sherwood]66-sherwood , had been hit by [a car]310-a car and [Jolie]67-jolie had to break it to [her]67-jolie . “ Come in . Sit . ”[67-jolie] [She]67-jolie popped open the door and [Merina]2471-merina entered [the guest room]311-the guest room .

White duvets and molded woodwork , modern flat - screen televisions and artwork . Red , gold , and deep orange accents added to the richness of the palette and were meant to show that a fire may have taken down [the original building]312-the original building but could n’t keep it down .

[Jolie]67-jolie gestured to the chair by the desk . [Merina]2471-merina refused to sit .

“ [Mom]67-jolie . What ’s going on ? ”[67-jolie]

On the end of a sigh that did n’t make [Merina]2471-merina feel any better , [[her]67-jolie mother]53-her mother spoke .

“ Several changes have been ordered for [the Van Heusen]68-ms. van heusen in order to modernize it . Fingerprint entry is just one of [them]314-them . Also , [the elevators]2086-the elevators will be replaced . ”[67-jolie]

“ Why ? ”[2471-merina] [Merina]2471-merina pictured the gold decorative doors with a Phoenix , the mythical bird that arose from the ashes of its predecessor , emblazoned on [them]314-them . If there was a beating heart in [the Van Heusen]68-ms. van heusen , it was that symbol . [Her]67-jolie stomach turned .

Instead of answering , [Jolie]67-jolie continued . “ Then there ’s the carpeting . The tapestry design wo n’t fit in with the new scheme . And probably the molding and ceiling medallions will all be replaced . ”[67-jolie] [She]67-jolie sighed again . “ It ’s a new era . ”[67-jolie]

“ When did [you]67-jolie take to day - drinking ? ”[2471-merina] [Merina]2471-merina asked , only half kidding .

[[Her]67-jolie mother]53-her mother laughed , but it was brief and faded almost instantly . [She]53-her mother touched [Merina]2471-merina ’s arm gently . “ Sweetheart . [We]2087-we were going to tell [you]67-jolie , but [we]2087-we wanted to make sure there really was no going back . [I]53-her mother did n’t expect the locksmith to arrive today . ”[53-her mother] [Her]53-her mother eyes strayed to the door .

[Merina]2471-merina ’s patience fizzled . “ Tell [me]2471-merina what ? ”[2471-merina]

“ [[Your]2471-merina father]2088-your father and [I]53-her mother sold [the Van Heusen]68-ms. van heusen to [Alexander Crane]69-alex six months ago . At the time , [he]69-alex had no plans on making any changes at all , but now that [he]69-alex ’s retiring , [the hotel]296-the hotel has fallen to [[his]69-alex oldest son]2089-his oldest son . Evidently , [Reese]377-reese had different ideas . ”[53-her mother]

At that pronouncement , [Jolie]67-jolie ’s normally sunny attitude clouded over . [Merina]2471-merina knew [the Cranes]315-the cranes . [The Crane Hotel]296-the hotel was [the biggest corporate hotel outfit in [the city]317-the city]296-the hotel , [the second biggest in [the nation]317-the city]296-the hotel . [Alexander]69-alex ( better known as “ [Big Crane ”]71-big crane[69-alex] ) and [[his]69-alex sons]318-his sons ran it , [local celebrities of sorts]319-local celebrities of sorts . [She]2471-merina ’d also read about [Big Crane]71-big crane ’s retirement and [Reese]377-reese ’s likely ascension to [CEO]377-reese .

But none of that mattered . There was only one newly learned fact bouncing around in [her]2471-merina brain . “ [You]2471-merina sold [the Van Heusen]68-ms. van heusen ? ”[2471-merina]

[She]2471-merina needed that chair after all . [She]2471-merina sank into it , mind blanking of everything except for one name : [Reese Crane]377-reese .

“ Why did n’t [you]2471-merina tell [me]2471-merina ? ”[2471-merina] [Merina]2471-merina stood up again . [She]2471-merina could n’t sit . [She]2471-merina could not remain still while this was happening . Correction : This had happened . “ Why did n’t [you]2471-merina talk to [me]2471-merina first ? ”[2471-merina]

“ [You]2471-merina know [we]2090-we ’d never include [you]2471-merina in [our]2090-we financial difficulties , [Merina]2471-merina . ”[67-jolie] [Jolie]67-jolie clucked [her]67-jolie tongue .

Financial difficulties ?

“ Bankruptcy was not an option , ”[53-her mother] [[her]67-jolie mom]53-her mother said . “ Plus , selling gave [us]2090-we the best of both worlds . No financial responsibility and [we]2090-we keep [our]2090-we jobs . ”[53-her mother]

“ With [Reese Crane]377-reese as [[your]377-reese boss]2091-your boss ! ”[67-jolie] [Her]67-jolie mind spun after [she]53-her mother said it aloud . [[My]0-i God]321-my god . [They]322-they would be answering to that arrogant , idiotic … “No . ”[322-they] [Merina]2471-merina shook [her]2471-merina head as [she]2471-merina strode past [[her]2471-merina mother]53-her mother . “ This is a mistake . ”[2471-merina]

And there had to be a way to undo it .

“ [Merina]2471-merina ! ”[53-her mother] [[her]2471-merina mother]53-her mother called after [her]2471-merina as [Merina]2471-merina bent and collected the discarded doorknob off the ground . [She]2471-merina strode through [the lobby]295-the lobby , dumping the remainder of [her]2471-merina latte in the wastebasket by the front desk , and then stomped outside .

As luck would have it , the light drizzle turned into steady rain the second [she]2471-merina marched through the crosswalk . Angry as [she]2471-merina was , [she]2471-merina ’d bet that steam rose off [her]2471-merina body where the raindrops pelted [her]2471-merina .

“ That stupid , smarmy jackass ! ”[2471-merina] [she]2471-merina said as [she]2471-merina pushed through a small crowd of [people]324-people hustling through the crosswalk . Because seriously , who in [their]324-people right mind would reconstruct [the Van Heusen]2471-merina ? Fingerprint entry ? This was n’t a James Bond movie ! [She]2471-merina caught a few sideways glances , but it was hard to tell if [they]324-people were because [she]2471-merina was muttering to [herself]2471-merina like [a loopy homeless person]325-a loopy homeless person or because [she]2471-merina was carrying a disembodied doorknob around with [her]2471-merina .

Could be both .

[[Her]2471-merina parents]290-her parents had sold [the Van Heusen]68-ms. van heusen to [the biggest , most ostentatious hotel chain in [the world]328-the world]327-the biggest , most ostentatious hotel chain in the world . And without telling [[their]290-her parents own daughter]329-their own daughter , who also happened to be [[the hotel]296-the hotel ’s manager]331-the hotel ’s manager ! How close to bankruptcy had [they]290-her parents been ? Could n’t [Merina]2471-merina have helped ? [She]2471-merina ’d never know now that [they]290-her parents ’d sneaked behind [her]2471-merina back .

How could [they]290-her parents do this to [me]0-i ?

[Merina]2471-merina was as much a part of [that hotel]296-the hotel as [they]290-her parents were . [[Her]2471-merina mother]53-her mother acted as if selling it was nothing more than an inconvenience .

Focus . [You]333-you ’re pissed at [Crane]2471-merina .

Right . [Big Crane]71-big crane may have done [[her]2471-merina parents]290-her parents a favor buying it , but now that [he]71-big crane was about to “ peace out , ”[71-big crane] it sounded like [Reese]377-reese had decided to flex [his]71-big crane corporate muscle .

“ Shit ! ”[2471-merina] [She]2471-merina did n’t just do that . [She]2471-merina did not just drown [her]2471-merina Louboutin pumps in a deep puddle by [the curb]335-the curb . [She]2471-merina did n’t splurge on much , but [her]2471-merina shoes were an indulgence . Chapter 18

[Reese]377-reese emitted a noncommittal grunt .

This week had been chipping away at [her]2471-merina soul .
